import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { loggedin , registeraccount , currentuser } from '../actions' import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; function Register() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const createaccount = () => { let username = document.getElementById('username').value let email = document.getElementById('email').value let psw = document.getElementById('psw').value dispatch(registeraccount({username:username,email:email,psw:psw})) dispatch(loggedin()) dispatch(currentuser) } return (
